languages.text: Зал приемов сегодня закрыт. Приходите в следующий приемный день.

traits.locale_text: Зал приемов сегодня закрыт. Приходите в следующий приемный день.

languages.text: "Пустите! Мой муж уже десять лет как мертв, а они до сих пор не зарегистрировали его рождение!"
"Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"
languages.original_text: "Пустите! Мой муж уже десять лет как мертв, а они до сих пор не зарегистрировали его рождение!"

traits.locale_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still have not registered his birth!"
"Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still have not registered his birth!"
"Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still have not registered his birth!"
"Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"
"Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

languages.text: "Lasst mich rein! Mein Mann ist seit zehn Jahren tot und sie haben bis heute seine Geburt nicht registriert!"
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: "Lasst mich rein! Mein Mann ist seit zehn Jahren tot und sie haben bis heute seine Geburt nicht registriert!"

languages.text: « Laisse-moi entrer ! Mon mari est mort depuis dix ans, mais son acte de naissance n'a toujours pas été délivré ! »
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: « Laisse-moi entrer ! Mon mari est mort depuis dix ans, mais son acte de naissance n'a toujours pas été délivré ! »

languages.text: “让我进去！我丈夫已经死了十年了，可那些人连他的出生登记都还没做呢！”
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: “让我进去！我丈夫已经死了十年了，可那些人连他的出生登记都还没做呢！”

languages.text: «¡Déjenme entrar! ¡Mi marido lleva diez años muerto y todavía no han registrado su nacimiento!».
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Déjenme entrar! ¡Mi marido lleva diez años muerto y todavía no han registrado su nacimiento!».

languages.text: 「入れてください！夫が死んで10年も経つのに、まだ出生届が出されていないんです！」
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: 「入れてください！夫が死んで10年も経つのに、まだ出生届が出されていないんです！」

languages.text: "Bırakın gireyim! Kocam on yıldır ölü ama doğumunu bile tescil etmediler!"
languages.original_text: "Let me in! My husband has been dead for ten years and they still haven't registered his birth!"

traits.locale_text: "Bırakın gireyim! Kocam on yıldır ölü ama doğumunu bile tescil etmediler!"
